Name: Little Big Guy
About the game: Little Big Guy is a third-person small-scale survival game. You can collect resources by researching around and craft new items. Survive It takes food, drink and rest to survive. Tools can be made by gathering resources and you can use them for hunting, farming or fishing. Base Building Wild animals and undead monsters will be found around.You need a safe place to protect yourself.You can also have your various stations here. Maps 2 maps are waiting to be explored.
